sql.query: INSERT INTO private_notes (context_id, user_id, note) SELECT DISTINCT ug.context_id, u.user_id, u.gossip FROM ojs_ts.users u JOIN ojs_ts.user_user_groups uug ON uug.user_id = u.user_id JOIN ojs_ts.user_groups ug ON ug.user_group_id = uug.user_group_id WHERE u.gossip IS NOT NULL AND u.gossip != ''
ALTER TABLE users DROP COLUMN gossip
